title.narrative: Shared Infrastructure for Solar Parks - Phase I

description.narrative: Support fthe setting up of solar parks in four states(Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh and Telangana) to increase solar generation capacity which will contribute to the achievement of GoI’s target of installing 100GW solar power by 2022.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
